STABLE POSITIONING - Non-slip rubber bottom on a durable desk chair cushion ensures that the cushion will not slip off easily on any seat during extended sitting sessions

PREMIUM MATERIALS - Our high-quality seat cushions for office chairs are made of the highest quality materials. The distinct smell that memory foam products emit is natural and common. We highly recommend thoroughly airing out the product to ensure any residual scent dissipates. This practice guarantees a more pleasant experience for users sensitive to odors
NEVER FLATENNING - Coccyx cushion for tailbone pain is engineered to maintain shape using body heat and supports even heavy-weight individuals effectively over extended periods of use
LIGHTWEIGHT and PORTABLE - Take our cushion for office chair with you wherever you go. Side handle for easy carrying - great choice for working, driving, traveling, or outdoor camping

MULTI-PURPOSE – Use our versatile seat cushion for tailbone pain relief as a seat cushion for car, office chair, desk chair, stadium, computer and gaming chair, truck, airplane, wheelchair, kayak, bus...Can be used to add height to any seat

EASY CLEANING & PREVENT SWEATING – Sit cool and dry with our reliable butt pillows for sitting. Machine-washable and breathable mesh cushion cover with an invisible zipper provides perfect ventilation to reduce sweating even in summer

PERFECT GIFT – This soft chair cushion for back pain is an amazing birthday or Christmas gift for family, friends, sedentary and elderly people, as well as for a pregnant woman. It can relieve discomfort from various conditions such as arthritis, disc herniation, post-operative injuries, or pregnancy

Your Posterior's Perfect Partner – Our Chair Cushions

Its lightweight and portable nature allows you to take it anywhere you need to be. With a convenient side handle, it's a fantastic companion for work, driving, travel, or even outdoor camping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality, comfort, reduced pain in lower back
reviews.reviewText: Bought one for my truck, was suprised by quality and comfort, pain in lower back disappeared. And must say that this was the best thing I bought online so far. Hitting the roads feels good again!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, maybe not for long legs
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is really comfortable. It fits nicely on a variety of chairs, including dining room chair, office chair, and rocking chair. It has a nice feel, but after sitting in it for awhile, it creates pressure on the edge for long legs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This added so much comfort to my work chair. The foam seating product was perfect and exactly what I was looking for.Quality seems good. I wish I ordered one sooner.Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Gets very hard
reviews.reviewText: It worked, I have tailbone issues and this did manage to help relieve the pressure but the memory foam hardens up to rock hard in no time when using it. If you move around and your tailbone is not centered squarely on the hole it will start hurting really fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Seat Cushion I've Ever Used!
reviews.reviewText: Best Seat Cushion I've Ever Used!As an office worker spending over 8 hours a day at my desk, I struggled with uncomfortable seating and lower back pain. This Aviora seat cushion has been a game-changer for me! In the past I have tried cushions from other brands, but this one stands out as the most reliable and comfortable by far. If you're in search of a solution for butt pressure and lower back pain, I highly recommend Aviora Seat Cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Way to small and when you seat gets flat almost like tortilla
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't expecting to fight the cushion toput my butt on the center off my butt and was expecting to hold my legs to, but like i say if have to fight to make hold my butt in the center the legs don't even touch the cushion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For office cannot be better product!
reviews.reviewText: My pain is done! amazing product !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Mainly a padded seat
reviews.reviewText: I was hoping to get relief with this as I sit all day long for work. I can't say I noticed much of a difference besides that my chair had more cushion. The bottom is supposed to be non-slip, but I am constantly adjusting the cushion and moving it around on my chair all day long. I suffer from severe back pain and this didn't help with my pain, nor relieve it. Also, make sure to let it air out before using it as it smells terrible when you take it out of the package due to it being foam.
